snippet: In this portfolio, some of the artists currently showing in “Joyride,” a group show devoted to two-wheeled transportation, pose with their bikes and share their feelings about their rides.
abstract: In this portfolio, some of the artists currently showing in “Joyride,” a group show devoted to two-wheeled transportation, pose with their bikes and share their feelings about their rides.

headline.main: 11 Artists Who Really, Really Love Their Bicycles
